channel.title: Ventrilo Server for you
channel.description:
Well i have been through a lot with rsc private servers and shit. I always liked a ventrilo server. So here you guys go you can use this to talk to people that play rs private servers.
Also i have added a channels for CS and WoW. If you have people that want a channel just ask me or one of my admins.
here is the information.
Hostname or IP: vent2.gameservers.com Port: 4263
just ask for tags i will be more than happy to give you one.
Thank You, Lefty
